TopicTitle: [GAME!] Describe the person above you in one sentence

Articles.Content:
The person above is careful with informations found in the internet and therefore gets the confirmation. ;D

Ich komme aus Deutschland hehe 8)
One of those strange advocates of googling.
The Above Average and Resourceful cardgame.
The generous European diplomat is above.
Why do I always choose to post after this guy?
A keeper of lulz avatars, randyrules711 is a brony who roleplays that I don\'t know well.
This person is wearing pants and does neat pixel art.
The person above will not have a round number of posts after responding once to something on this forum.
The person who has a stretched sig thus he gets this:
A man of high standards, but great caution.
A person that is new.
This person is a rocket expansion-ist! (Hi Jebediah Kerman!)
a PERSON WHO DOES\'NT GIVE A... dont anyone say pony next it is too obvious
A person who is a brony.
A person who is obvious.
Ditto.
The person above partakes quite frequently in Forum Games, despite being relatively quiet in the other areas of the Kerbal Space Program (c.2011 - Squad) Forum.
^Is formal in most of his posts, and has frequent jaunts to the Gaming Sub-Forum.
The above is an RPer; although isn\'t commonly on.
The person above can be credited with the first mapping of the Mun, prior to the invention of the Mapping Plugin, for RP purposes.
RP Mod, organises many things in RP.
The above is the leader of Cerfesa, a polar nation with little in the way of unfrozen wasteland.
The above reminds me of my RP dilemmas.

The above reminds me of my own RP dilemmas, of which I must decide between bringing a bottle of wine and a Marcieno suit to a gala in Arcel, or moving the Gala to the sunny beach on Avienne\'s North Shore.
The above makes me want to invade Ghritz.
